title: I got the new champ. But i cant play her!
body:
I can ban her when I go to play her she is not there. i tried to restart client but i still cant play her. been 3 days now idk what to do

**Update I just did the repair and she still isn't there plz help I want to ply my champion

replies.body:
It's actually not a bug at all, just a lack of information.

Kai'Sa isn't under any list as of yet because she's **_Adaptable_**.

Puns aside, try typing her name into the search bar or scrolling down to find her without any role (Mid/Marksman etc) selected.
The reason she isn't showing up for you is because you're filtering it to "Bottom Lane Only".

Let me know if that solved it for you, as I was confused at first too!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
